Motto: Create Professional CVs with Privately & Securely
Slogan: Build stunning resumes with complete privacy. Your data never leaves your browser - GDPR compliant by design, completely free, and always secure.
Slogan2: Experience the perfect balance of powerful features and complete privacy protection.
FeatureCard1: No hidden costs, no premium plans, no subscriptions. Create unlimited CVs completely free.
FeatureCard2: Built from the ground up with privacy regulations in mind. Your rights are protected by default.
FeatureCard3: All your data stays in your browser. No servers, no cloud storage.
FeatureCard5: Download your CV as PDF, Word, or other formats. Your data, your control, your choice.
FeatureCard6: Choose from beautiful, ATS-friendly templates designed to help you stand out to employers.
StepSlogan: Create your professional CV in just three simple steps. No registration required.
StepCard1: Select from our collection of professional, ATS-friendly CV templates.
StepCard2: Add your information directly in your browser. Everything stays local and private.
StepCard3: Export your polished CV and start applying to your dream jobs immediately.
CTAHeader: Ready to Create Your Perfect CV?
CTAHeaderSlogan: Join thousands of job seekers who trust CVGen for their career success. Start building your professional CV today - completely free and private.
